item.title: CVE-2022-35725|2024-08-03T09:44:21.500Z -- hans%20matzen -- wp-forecast%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Hans Matzen's wp-forecast plugin <= 7.5 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-30429|2024-06-19T14:31:01.969Z -- hans%20matzen -- wp-forecast
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hans Matzen allows Stored XSS.This issue affects wp-forecast: from n/a through 9.2.
